info.author: Samuel Abels
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Spiff Integrator is a small but powerful package manager that was written
for adding plugin support into applications. It handles packing/unpacking,
installation/updates/removal, and dependency management and provides a bus
over which plugins may communicate.
It was designed to provide a clean API, high security and high scalability.

For documentation please refer to the `README file`_ or the tests included
with the package. You may also look at the `API documentation`_.

.. _README file: http://code.google.com/p/spiff-integrator/source/browse/trunk/README
.. _API documentation: http://docs.debain.org/spiff_integrator/index.html
info.keywords: spiff integrator package manager dpkg install uninstall dependency
info.name: SpiffIntegrator
info.summary: A package/plugin manager implemented in Python
info.html_description:
Spiff Integrator is a small but powerful package manager that was written for adding plugin support into applications. It handles packing/unpacking, installation/updates/removal, and dependency management and provides a bus over which plugins may communicate. It was designed to provide a clean API, high security and high scalability.

For documentation please refer to the README file or the tests included with the package. You may also look at the API documentation.
